virtualpets

Class HomePanel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • virtualpets.HomePanel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, Observable

    public class HomePanel
extends javax.swing.JPanel
implements Observable
    Home JPanel for VirtualPets Assignment. Acts as a controller for the panels beneath it.
    Author:
    Samuel Pell, Ollie Chick
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

                        int currentDay,
                        int numActions,
                        java.lang.Boolean currentlySleeping,

        Refreshes all statistics and tabs presented to user.
        Parameters:
        currentPlayer - Player to display stats for
        currentPet - Pet to display stats for
        currentDay - Current day number
        numActions - number of actions remaining
        currentlySleeping - Is the current pet sleeping?
        currentlyOnToilet - Is the current pet on the toilet?
